title: Horizontal Ground Points Start [m]
desc: Choose the starting value of the ground points range.

title: Horizontal Ground Points End [m]
desc: Choose the last value of the ground points range.

title: Number of Ground Points
desc: Number of points within the range where the audible noise will be computed.

title: Automatic Y-Axis Limits
desc: If switched on, the limits of the axis will be defined automatically and the values below are ignored.

title: Lower Y-Axis Limit [dB]
desc: Manually define the lower axis limit.

title: Upper Y-Axis Limit [dB]
desc: Manually define the upper axis limit.

title: Acoustic Power Unit
desc: Choose the unit for the acoustic power calculation.

title: Altitude Correction
desc: The altitude above sea level in meter.

title: Rain Correction
desc: Enter the rain rate for the audible noise calculation. The correction is done using the 1982 EPRI method but applies to all AC audible noise calculations in foul weather. Valid values are between 0.1-30 mm/h, otherwise the default 0.8 mm/h is used.

title: Calculate AC EPRI
desc: Include the AC audible noise calculation according to EPRI if switched on.

title: AC EPRI Weather
desc: Choose the weather condition for the AC EPRI audible noise calculation.

title: AC EPRI Offset
desc: Return the audible noise values including DC offset switched on.

title: Calulate AC BPA
desc: Include the AC audible noise calculation according to BPA if switched on.

title: AC BPA Weather
desc: Choose the weather condition for the AC BPA audible noise calculation.

title: AC BPA Offset
desc: Return the audible noise values including DC offset switched on.

title: Calculate DC EPRI
desc: Include the DC audible noise calculation according to EPRI if switched on.

title: DC EPRI Weather
desc: Choose the weather condition for the DC EPRI audible noise calculation.

title: DC EPRI Season
desc: Choose the season for the DC EPRI audible noise calculation.

title: Calculate DC BPA
desc: Include the DC audible noise calculation according to EPRI if switched on.

title: DC BPA Weather
desc: Choose the weather condition for the DC BPA audible noise calculation.

title: DC BPA Season
desc: Choose the season for the DC BPA audible noise calculation.

title: DC CRIEPI
desc: Include the DC audible noise calculation according to CRIEPI if switched on.
